text:
Here we help intermediate and advanced learners just like
you learn English in a fun and dynamic way,
without getting lost, without missing the jokes and without subtitles.

So if you’re ready to learn English
that you can actually use in real life,

join our community of over 5M learners
by subscribing to our channel
and turning on the notifications so you don’t miss any lessons.
Aside from video games, watching TV series is also a great way to improve your English.
And that’s why we created our Fluent with Friends course.
In this course, you will learn some of the most common words and expressions that natives use all the time.
You will also learn how natives reduce, cut and connect the sounds
so it will no longer be a challenge for you to understand when we speak fast.
If you’re tired of boring and traditional methods that don’t make you fluent, you will love this course!
And you can start learning today with our FREE 3-part masterclass.
Just click up here or down in the description below to sign up now!
So what other great video games to learn English would you include on the list?

Share your favorites down in the comments 
below with your fellow learners!

But now, how about testing your knowledge on what you’ve
learned today? Here we go!
Did you like our list of the best video games to lean English?

Well, why not learn about some of the Best TV Series
that you can learn English with in 2022?
Let's watch a clip from that lesson now!
